events.name: Oklahoma City Thunder at Cleveland Cavaliers

headlines.description: — Jarrett Allen scored 25 points, Evan Mobley added 21 and the Cleveland Cavaliers ended Oklahoma City's 15-game winning streak by beating the Thunder 129-122 on Wednesday night in a marquee meeting between the NBA's top two teams.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cavaliers beat Thunder 129-122 to end OKC's 15-game winning streak in matchup of NBA's top teams

events.name: Portland Trail Blazers at New Orleans Pelicans

highlights.headline: Blazers go up 33 on Shaedon Sharpe's halftime buzzer-beater
highlights.description: Shaedon Sharpe knocks down a triple as time expires to put the Blazers ahead of the Pelicans by 33 points.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Blazers go up 33 on Shaedon Sharpe's halftime buzzer-beater) 2025/01/08 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Deni Avdija scored 26 points, Shaedon Sharpe added 21 points and the Portland Trail Blazers led wire to wire in a 119-100 victory over the struggling New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Deni Avdija scores 26 as the Trail Blazers down the Pelicans 119-100

headlines.description: — Damian Lillard had 26 points and eight assists, Giannis Antetokounmpo had 25 points, 16 rebounds and eight assists, and the Milwaukee Bucks beat the San Antonio Spurs 121-105 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lillard scores 26 points, Antetokounmpo adds 25 points and 16 rebounds as Bucks beat Spurs 121-105
